paragraph.value: Table 4 reports the results for all of the 2-layer L-, T-, and H-biLSTMs. The
system for each dataset and metric are highlighted in purple, and when the
system for a particular dataset was a 1-layer model, that system is included in Table 4. The
system for each is reported in Table 4. On its own, the biLSTM with linear topology (L-biLSTM) performs
than the biLSTM with tree topology (T-biLSTM). However, the hybrid topology (H-biLSTM), consisting of both a L- and TbiLSTM is the
system on UW for correlation (Table 4). Though our methods achieve state of the art in the single-task setting, the
systems are mostly multi-task (Table 4 and Supplementary Materials).
